price: 132. Mpe Ibrâhîm apesaki yango mitindo na bana naye, mpe lolenge moko na Ya’qûb alobaki na bana naye: Eh bana na nga!, ya sôló Allah aponeli bino lingomba. Bokufa te bobele bozala nakati ya komisokia.
arabic: وَوَصَّىٰ بِهَآ إِبۡرَٰهِـۧمُ بَنِيهِ وَيَعۡقُوبُ يَٰبَنِيَّ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ ٱصۡطَفَىٰ لَكُمُ ٱلدِّينَ فَلَا تَمُوتُنَّ إِلَّا وَأَنتُم مُّسۡلِمُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.
